::Autofire::

Autofire's expression remains as it was, neutral, though his mind was 
definitely surprised that the bot had claimed to be Megatron. Autofire 
had been first created as a bounty hunter in the days of the great 
war, and served as a mercenary for both Autobots and Decepticons, as 
well as later hunting down bots and bringing them in for a reward. He 
had gotten to earth on a mission to follow Adrax, and had been buried 
under an avalanche while fighting him. Autofire was later restored by 
the Vok, his body adapted to this planet's conditions. However, after 
being buried under the ice, he could no longer feel the Vok presence 
in his head.

Autofire's eyes look over the cannon. This bot looked like a smaller 
version of the Decepticon commander, though Autofire had never 
actually met him in person, untill now.

"Megatron, hmm.." he says, the chain gun flipping back into his 
wrists. He doubted Megatron could muster the power to even punch at 
him right now. "I'm Autofire. What are you doing here?"

He wondered if Megatron had been informed of those times when Autofire 
had been hired by the Decepticons. If he had been, then he might 
remember him.

(We didn't talk about them knowing each other, Jer, but its up to you)
